channel.title: Drowning sound when touching water
channel.description: It's nothing gamebreaking, just mildly annoying. Sometimes when you touch the water (even just dip your feet in) you can hear bubbles or something, I'm pretty sure that sound is supposed to be heard when drowning, not just jumping into water, especially when your head is still above it.

item.title: Drowning sound when touching water
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
I believe this is already fixed on our internal CU3 build.

Read full topic

Thanks for posting about it, regardless. I was getting that sound in my OCPD maps, and was worried it was something I had done.

item.title: Drowning sound when touching water
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
Papa Deltu:

It’s nothing gamebreaking, just mildly annoying. Sometimes when you touch the water (even just dip your feet in) you can hear bubbles or something, I’m pretty sure that sound is supposed to be heard when drowning, not just jumping into water, especially when your head is still above it.

That sound slipped into the last patch. Devs are aware.

Read full topic

item.title: Drowning sound when touching water

It’s nothing gamebreaking, just mildly annoying. Sometimes when you touch the water (even just dip your feet in) you can hear bubbles or something, I’m pretty sure that sound is supposed to be heard when drowning, not just jumping into water, especially when your head is still above it.
